Class GuiStateManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.helpers.GuiStateManager
public class GuiStateManager extends Object
Helper class for game state management logic extracted from GuiController. Handles game state transitions and overlay visibility.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GuiStateManager(javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty isPause, javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty isGameOver, javafx.scene.layout.Pane pauseOverlay, GameOverPanel gameOverPanel, GuiDangerHelper dangerHelper, GuiColorHelper colorHelper, GameMode currentMode)
    Creates a new state manager with the specified UI components and helpers.

  • Constructor Details

    • GuiStateManager

      public GuiStateManager(javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty isPause, javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty isGameOver, javafx.scene.layout.Pane pauseOverlay, GameOverPanel gameOverPanel, GuiDangerHelper dangerHelper, GuiColorHelper colorHelper, GameMode currentMode)
      Creates a new state manager with the specified UI components and helpers.
      Parameters:
      isPause - boolean property for pause state
      isGameOver - boolean property for game over state
      pauseOverlay - the pause overlay pane
      gameOverPanel - the game over panel
      dangerHelper - helper for danger zone management
      colorHelper - helper for color management
      currentMode - the current game mode

  • Method Details

    • setGameState

      public void setGameState(GameState newState)
      Central helper for changing game state. Keeps internal flags and overlays in sync.
      Parameters:
      newState - the new game state to set

    • getGameState

      public GameState getGameState()
      Gets the current game state.
      Returns:
      the current game state

    • setGameOver

      public void setGameOver()
      Sets game over state and makes blocks visible in Invisible mode.

    • resetGameOverState

      public void resetGameOverState()
      Resets game over state in color helper.
